scripts.types:check: pnpm --filter @repo/ui run build && turbo run types:check
scripts.add:package: pnpm dlx turbo gen workspace --type package --name
scripts.add:app: pnpm dlx turbo gen workspace --type app --name
scripts.sync: git fetch template && git merge template/main
scripts.sync:initial: git fetch template && git merge template/main --allow-unrelated-histories
scripts.setup:sync: git remote get-url template >/dev/null 2>&1 && git remote set-url template https://github.com/impulse-studio/ultimate-template.git || git remote add template https://github.com/impulse-studio/ultimate-template.git
